extendedIngredients.name: granny smith apples
extendedIngredients.original: 3 Granny Smith apples (1 1/2 lbs), cut lengthwise into 1-inch-thick sticks
extendedIngredients.originalName: Granny Smith apples , cut lengthwise into 1-inch-thick sticks

extendedIngredients.name: olive oil
extendedIngredients.original: 1 to 2 Tbsps fruity extra-virgin olive oil

extendedIngredients.name: ribs celery
extendedIngredients.original: 6 medium celery ribs without leaves (1 lb)

extendedIngredients.name: sea-salt
extendedIngredients.original: Flaky sea salt such as Maldon
extendedIngredients.originalName: Flaky sea salt such as Maldon

extendedIngredients.name: wasabi
extendedIngredients.original: 1/2 tsp wasabi paste or powdered wasabi

title: Apple Celery Granita
summary: Apple Celery Granitan is a gluten free and vegan recipe with 6 servings. For 86 cents per serving, this recipe covers 5% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. One portion of this dish contains approximately 1g of protein, 3g of fat, and a total of 135 calories. 1 person has made this recipe and would make it again. If you have flaky sea salt such as maldon, olive oil, celery ribs without leaves, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 5 hours. With a spoonacular score of 32%, this dish is not so amazing.
